recipesJson.name: Vapetasia Raindow Road: DMC Cloning with the Crew
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description:
This is an attempt at Vapetasia Rainbow Road. Pretty spot imo. Enjoy!!
Flavor notes here====> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A8M1VHJvikA

Come join us on our Facebook. New mixers always welcome====> https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmcdiy/

Perfectly recreating a breakfast favorite in vape liquid form, this flavor mixes your favorite cereal with freshly picked mixed berries and splashes them into a bowl of rich, creamy milk.

pageContext.name: Vapetasia Raindow Road: DMC Cloning with the Crew
